plot: Loosely based on the novel by Bram Stoker, the film follows Count Dracula from Transylvania to London and back again. Shot in moody black and white.
title: Dracula
plot_es: Loosely based on the novel by Bram Stoker, the film follows Count Dracula from Transylvania to London and back again. Shot in moody black and white.
